summary: Build a website for a stationery shop named "Subrin Kitab Pasal" located in Makalbari, Kathmandu, including contact number 9888888888.
architectural_notes: Founder image should be rendered as a small circular avatar (CSS border-radius: 50%) with suitable sizing/alignment per design.
known_issues: Favicon shows default browser tab icon because the referenced generated favicon file (/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png) is missing from public assets, causing a fallback to the default icon.
Favicon still not showing in the browser tab after Version 7 deploy; likely still an issue with favicon asset presence/path or browser caching.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page marketing website for the stationery shop named "Subrin KItab PAsal" with the following sections: Header (shop name + simple navigation), Hero (headline + short description), Products/Offerings (stationery categories), About (brief shop intro), Location (Kathmandu), and Contact (prominently show phone number 9888888888). All user-facing copy must be in English.

Implement a coherent visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) with a distinct stationery/bookshop feel and apply it consistently across all sections. Avoid blue/purple as the primary palette.
Add a footer that repeats the shop name, Kathmandu location, and phone number 9888888888, and includes a short copyright line.
Add the required generated images to the project under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them on the homepage (logo in header and a hero illustration/banner in the hero section).

Update the displayed shop location to "Makalbari, Kathmandu" in both places where location is shown: (1) the Location section content and supporting sentence, and (2) the Footer location line. Ensure the updated location text is visible on the page and remains in English.

Create a finalized website logo image from the user-uploaded file (image-2.png) and add it to the project as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated with the filename subrin-logo.dim_512x512.png.

Update the site to use the new logo consistently: the header logo and footer logo must display frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-logo.dim_512x512.png, and the browser tab favicon should be set to a favicon generated from the same logo.
Update the About section content to explicitly state the founder’s full name as "Subrin Shrestha" (in English) and ensure the text is visible on the page.
Add a founder image to the website by placing the processed uploaded image under frontend/public/assets/generated and rendering it in the About section with appropriate alt text.

In the About section, move the founder photo content to appear exactly last within the About section’s content (after the About text content), and change the founder photo presentation to a small, circular (avatar-style) image that looks visually suitable on both mobile and desktop.

Generate a PNG favicon from the user-uploaded image (Screenshot 2026-02-11 162152.png), add it as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated, and update the HTML favicon link so the browser tab uses this new favicon.

Add the missing generated favicon image file to the frontend static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png so the browser can load the favicon instead of falling back to the default tab icon.
Ensure the favicon file exists in the deployed frontend static assets at exactly: frontend/public/assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png, and that it is a valid, non-empty PNG image.

Keep frontend/index.html favicon markup correct and compatible across browsers by ensuring a 32x32 PNG favicon link is present and points to /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png, and add a second redundant favicon link (same href) using rel="shortcut icon" to improve compatibility.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for the stationery shop "Subrin Kitab Pasal" (Kathmandu) including contact details (9888888888).
Update the site location to "Makalbari, Kathmandu" in both the Location section and the footer.
Add a website logo (web logo) to the site (details/spec to be clarified).
Update founder name to "Subrin Shrestha" and add an image (founder or relevant) to the website.
Adjust the founder photo presentation to be smaller and displayed in a circular (avatar-style) crop, positioned appropriately ("exactly last" as requested).
Set the site favicon to use the logo (add the logo as browser tab favicon).

Ensure frontend/index.html references the correct favicon path and filename: /assets/generated/subrin-favicon-uploaded.dim_32x32.png (type image/png, sizes 32x32). Update it only if it does not exactly match the generated asset filename/path.
